cases.title: Neurosurgery Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Car Accident Case
cases.description: The court ruled defendant's Neurosurgery Expert Witness could testify that plaintiff's injuries were pre-existing.

cases.title: Security Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying in Musical Festival Assault Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Security Expert Witness report was too conclusory to be helpful to the jury.

cases.title: Equipment & Machinery Expert Witness Testimony Excluded in Products Liability Matter
cases.description: Defendant's Equipment & Machinery Expert Witness used unreliable methodology in skid loader case and was excluded.
